data.eml:eml: Two new species of hermit crabs of the genus Areopaguristes Rahayu & McLaughlin, 2010 (Crustacea: Anomura: Paguroidea: Diogenidae) from the eastern tropical Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ayón-Parente, Manuel, Hendrickx, Michel E. (2012): Two new species of hermit crabs of the genus Areopaguristes Rahayu & McLaughlin, 2010 (Crustacea: Anomura: Paguroidea: Diogenidae) from the eastern tropical Pacific. Zootaxa 3407: 22-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.211808
